subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Putting into practice the horse-racing adage to breed the best to the best, the three Yoshida brothers are continuing the family's winning legacy in Japan and abroad.
